AllergyIntoleranceSubstanceExposureRisk

The risk of an adverse reaction (allergy or intolerance) for this patient upon exposure to the substance (including pharmaceutical products).

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/allerg-intol-substance-exp-risk defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
known-reaction-risk Known Reaction Risk Known risk of allergy or intolerance reaction upon exposure to the specified substance.
no-known-reaction-risk No Known Reaction Risk No known risk of allergy or intolerance reaction upon exposure to the specified substance.
